pinyin: zhun3 wen3 xuan2 wo1 jie2 gou4

sentences.english: The results show that the vortex motion is unstable for small three-dimensional disturbances in the separated wake of a circular cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，圓柱分離尾跡中的旋渦存在三維不穩定性。
船後的水翻起無數個旋渦。

sentences.english: Such divorce makes the spiral mode of density waves in a disk-shaped galaxy unstable;
sentences.chinese: 這樣的分離導致密度波的旋渦模式的不穩定性。

sentences.english: Subscripts Z and E are for zonal and eddy components respectively.
sentences.chinese: 下角標Z和E分別表示緯向分量和旋渦分量。

sentences.english: Most spiral galaxies have two, but Messier 106 has four.
sentences.chinese: 大多數旋渦星系有兩支，但梅西耶106有四支。

sentences.english: At medium power, this meningioma is composed of whorled nests of cells.
sentences.chinese: 中倍鏡，腦膜瘤由旋渦狀瘤細胞巢組成。

sentences.english: It's the largest known vortex in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 它是太陽系中已知的旋渦中最大的一個。

sentences.english: But their work appears to merge in the study of large eddies.
sentences.chinese: 但在大旋渦的研究上，他們的工作看來卻殊途同歸。

sentences.english: The vortex shedding characteristic on heated circular cylinder in water cross flow is examined experimentally in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對水橫掠熱柱體時旋渦脫落時的流動試驗進行了分析。

sentences.english: Vortices accelerate reaction rates of the unreacted region.
sentences.chinese: 旋渦加速了未反應區的化學反應速率。

sentences.english: The huge whirlpool could suck in the boat.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的旋渦能把小船吞沒。

sentences.english: The vortical flow dominated by leading edge separated vortex is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 討論了前緣分離渦爲主體的旋渦流場。

sentences.english: There is now a black swirly animation when a spell is resisted.
sentences.chinese: 當法術被抵抗的時候有一個黑色旋渦形的效果。

sentences.english: Research on Dilute Parti-cles Motion in Secondary Vortex Flow.
sentences.chinese: 旋渦二次流中稀疏顆粒的運動特性研究。

sentences.english: The invention is an efficient positive vortex pump, which belongs to fluid machinery.
sentences.chinese: 本發明是一種高效的正旋渦泵，屬於流體機械。

sentences.english: But their work appears to merge in the study of large eddies .
sentences.chinese: 但在大旋渦的研究上，他們的工作看來卻殊途同歸。

definition: so deep one cannot see to the bottom/limitless
to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
cage used to hold or transport prisoners
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
toadying for personal gain/to curry favor/to study in great depth
lit. shocks the eye, astonishes the heart (idiom); shocking/horrible to see/a ghastly sight/also written 觸目驚心|触目惊心
variant of 矇騙|蒙骗[meng1 pian4]
